abstract: The package delivery company predicted third-quarter profits below analysts’ projections.
snippet: The package delivery company predicted third-quarter profits below analysts’ projections.
lead_paragraph: United Parcel Service, the world’s largest package delivery company, said on Thursday that its second-quarter earnings fell 49 percent as the recession cut business demand.

headline.main: U.P.S. Earnings Decline 49%, to $445 Million, as Downturn Saps Demand
headline.print_headline: U.P.S. Earnings Decline 49%, to $445 Million, as Downturn Saps Demand
